function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor indoor air quality","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and other airborne diseases","Mitigation":"Increase ventilation by opening windows, using outdoor air dampers, and adjusting thermostat settings","Technologies":"High-efficiency air filters, ventilation systems","People":"Workers, personnel","Owner":"Workplace management"},{"Description":"Insufficient social distancing among workers","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of ventilation cleaning effects, leading to higher risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Enforce larger social distance among workers to improve ventilation cleaning effects","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Workers, personnel","Owner":"Workplace management"}]}
